publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3443 Iain Smith: Fife Rail Services—That the Parliament notes the amended rail services in Fife introduced by the 2002-03 winter timetable; welcomes, in particular, the new 06:00 service from Dundee to Edinburgh and 18:42 service from Edinburgh to Dundee, operated by Virgin Trains, which will help to increase travel opportunities and reduce overcrowding for passengers from north-east Fife, and calls on the train operating companies to continue to improve the rail service in Fife and, in particular, on ScotRail to restore the stop at Ladybank on the 08:49 service from Perth to Edinburgh.
S1M-3443 Fife Rail Services (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-3443 Iain Smith: Fife Rail Services—That the Parliament notes the amended rail services in Fife introduced by the 2002-03 winter timetable; welcomes, in particular, the new 06:00 service from Dundee to Edinburgh and 18:42 service from Edinburgh to Dundee, operated by Virgin Trains, which will help to increase travel opportunities and reduce overcrowding for passengers from north-east Fife, and calls on the train operating companies to continue to improve the rail service in Fife and, in particular, on ScotRail to restore the stop at Ladybank on the 08:49 service from Perth to Edinburgh.Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone
S1M-3443 Fife Rail Services (lodged on 30 September 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3443 Fife Rail Services (lodged on 30 September 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3443 Fife Rail Services (lodged on 30 September 2002) Ms Sandra White*
